name: Split
description: SPLIT is 2.5D puzzle platformer with precision platforming and mind-bending puzzles. Play as Mirim as she adventures through the World of Abstraction.CREATE YOUR OWN PATHMirim now has the power to change the world around her. Split into two, causing the environment to do the same. Use this new power to create your own path forward through this bizarre world.NEW WORLD, NEW POWERSBeing originally from earth, Mirim finds that she can do a lot more in this world than she could before. Use your new Split powers to create new platforms to jump on and reflect the walls to create new pathways were previously there weren't.BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITYEach new play through reorders the world with some new levels and a different order. No playthrough will be similar.
